## Text.convertToCrLf() method

Converts all newlines in the provided string to use Windows-style CRLF end of line characters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static convertToCrLf(input: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
